mil5.4.10:1.4_0: ‘tathāgatena sāriputtamoggallānappamukhe bhikkhusaṅghe paṇāmite cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati bījūpamañca vacchataruṇūpamañca upadassetvā bhagavantaṁ pasādesuṁ khamāpesuṁ nijjhattaṁ akaṁsū’ti.
mil5.4.10:1.5_2: yāhi tathāgato upamāhi orato khamito upasanto nijjhattaṁ gato?
mil5.4.10:1.6_1: tathāgatassa tā upamā aññātā, tena hi buddho asabbaññū, yadi ñātā,
mil5.4.10:1.6_2: tena hi okassa pasayha vīmaṁsāpekkho paṇāmesi,
mil5.4.10:1.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.4.10:2.1_1: tāhi ca upamāhi bhagavā pasanno orato khamito upasanto nijjhattaṁ gato.
mil5.4.10:2.2_1: tathāgatappavediteheva te opammehi tathāgataṁ ārādhesuṁ tosesuṁ pasādesuṁ,
mil5.4.10:3.1_1: itthī sāmikassa santakeneva dhanena sāmikaṁ ārādheti toseti pasādeti,
mil5.4.10:3.2_1: cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati tathāgatappavediteheva opammehi tathāgataṁ ārādhesuṁ tosesuṁ pasādesuṁ,
mil5.4.10:4.1_1: kappako rañño santakeneva suvaṇṇaphaṇakena rañño uttamaṅgaṁ pasādhayamāno rājānaṁ ārādheti toseti pasādeti,
mil5.4.10:4.1_2: tassa ca rājā pasanno ‘sādhū’ti abbhānumodati, yathicchitamanuppadeti;
mil5.4.10:4.2_1: cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati tathāgatappavediteheva opammehi tathāgataṁ ārādhesuṁ tosesuṁ pasādesuṁ,
mil5.4.10:5.1_1: saddhivihāriko upajjhāyābhataṁ piṇḍapātaṁ gahetvā upajjhāyassa upanāmento upajjhāyaṁ ārādheti toseti pasādeti,
mil5.4.10:5.2_1: cātumeyyakā ca sakyā brahmā ca sahampati tathāgatappavediteheva opammehi tathāgataṁ ārādhesuṁ tosesuṁ pasādesuṁ,
mil5.4.10:5.2_2: tesañca tathāgato pasanno ‘sādhū’ti abbhānumoditvā sabbadukkhaparimuttiyā dhammaṁ desesī”ti.
